data.eml:eml: This dataset includes all animal species of Suriname included in the IUCN Red List Categories Near Threatened, Vulnerable, Endangered and Critically Endangered. In addition, all species occurring in Suriname and listed in Appendices I and II of CITES. A third category are species considered threatened according to local experts. These species have been given a NZCS assessment. This usually concerns species not (yet) included in the IUCN Red List or species not yet fully described for science.
